series_description: This series documents accounts payable vouchers that do not involve funding from federal sources. This series may include, but is not limited to: FD-1 Vouchers, Construction and Maintenance vouchers, and Small Purchase Charge card reconciliation packages that do not involve federal funds.
retention_statement: 6 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents accounts payable vouchers that involve projects that are funded from federal sources. This series may include, but is not limited to: FD-1 vouchers, construction and maintenance vouchers, small purchase charge card reconciliation packages, employee travel reimbursement and expense reports.
This series documents summaries of the agency's financial operations. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports.
This series documents bond statements that are used for and preparing financial reports. This series may include, but is not limited to: bond statements and correspondence

This series documents bond transactions such as the recordation of new and refunding bond issues, bond proceeds, related cost of issuance, defeasance of debt, and debt service payments.This series may include, but is not limited to: statements, vouchers, and bond closing documents.

This series documents transactions involving consultant services used on road projects. This series may include, but is not limited to:consultant agreements, AP voucher transmittal forms, and project estimate vouchers.

This series documents information on invoices or agreements submitted to the federal government for projects that receive federal aid. This series may include, but is not limited to: and correspondence.

series_title: Federal Wire Deposit and Expenditure Transfers
series_description: This series documents the recording of payments received the Federal Highway Administration (FHWA). This series may include, but is not limited to: Journal Vouchers, Batch and supporting documentation.
This series documents transaction requests for Journal Vouchers and Correction Vouchers. This series may include, but is not limited to: vouchers and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 10 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents changes to and status of employee payroll information and Worker's Compensation cases. This series may include, but is not limited to: Form FD204 and bank deposits.

This series documents agreements and billing of projects for which the county, town, city, or utilities contribute money for construction or road maintenance. This series may include, but is not limited to: agreements, forms and supporting documentation.

This series documents amounts owed by individuals who damage VDOT property such as that caused by a traffic accident. This series may include, but is not limited to: photographs, police reports, and estimates for repairs.

This series documents tax information required by and to the IRS on federal identification numbers and reportable income payments of vendors. This series may include, but is limited to: W-9 and 1099 forms, and 972CG reports
retention_statement: 4 Years after end of state fiscal year
